```{r, echo=F, message=F, include=F}
devtools::load_all(".")
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "../figures/Domains-"
)
```

```{r, echo=T, message=F, include=T}
P5 = c(60, 67) %>% mami.codi(num_harmonics = 1, verbose=T)
domains = P5 %>% dplyr::select(c('frequencies', 'periods', 'wavenumbers', 'wavelengths')) %>% tidyr::unnest(cols=everything())
```

```{r, echo=T, message=F, include=T}
tibble::tibble(
cycles( domains$frequencies / min(domains$frequencies), 
        STANDARD_DEVIATION, HARMONICS_DEVIATION, 'f') %>% 
  dplyr::select('f_cycles'),
cycles( domains$periods / max(domains$periods), 
        STANDARD_DEVIATION, HARMONICS_DEVIATION, 't') %>% 
  dplyr::select('t_cycles'),

cycles( domains$wavenumbers / max(domains$wavenumbers), 
        STANDARD_DEVIATION, HARMONICS_DEVIATION, 'k') %>% 
  dplyr::select('k_cycles'),
cycles( domains$wavelengths / min(domains$wavelengths), 
        STANDARD_DEVIATION, HARMONICS_DEVIATION, 'l') %>% 
  dplyr::select('l_cycles'),
)
```
